*** Bug 187157 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

It looks like you installed a plug-in that disposes system colors (COLOR_DARK_GRAY in this case) - pretty ugly.

Cannot reproduce using plain Eclipse SDK 3.3 M7.
Changing OS from Mac OS to Mac OS X as per bug 185991
